document_data.name: Salak
document_data.mainbody: ake had green scales with a yellowish underbelly.
document_data.Description: Snake had green scales with a yellowish underbelly.
document_data.History:
[[File:Salak business deal.jpg|300px|thumb|''Salak making a deal with a magistrate.'']]
Salak "helped" the magistrates of the prison keep the secrets of the local [[Wheloon/drainage culverts|underground tunnels]] in exchange for being handsomely paid, and could be seen at the [[Ball and Chain Tavern]] meeting them for business.
